value:
$WmMPID_ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Greetings, strangers. Tell me,
just who are you?$k$pOrder of Heroes? From another
world, you say? That sounds
pretty suspicious to me.$k$pI'm afraid I can't let you go any
further. I wish I had Chrom here to
help fight you off, but—$k$pOh, uh, Tharja? Where'd you
come from? Are you following me
around again?$k$pNever mind that now. You can
help me put a stop to these
strangers here!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You circumvented my strategy?
Incredible. I guess your tactician
can't be half bad.$k$pBut I've got more tactics that
will trip you up—many more allies
to keep you from going further!$k$Sbs150|
